oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Oklahoma Roundup - 1947-05-07 - KOMA - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part one of a performance from the Oklahoma Roundup radio program on May 7, 1947 on radio station KOMA (Oklahoma City, Okla). Staff includes Hiram Higsby (master of ceremonies, writer), Allan Page (announcer, director), and Kenyon Brown (producer).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Chuck Davis; Roundup Boys; Lexie Lou and Ray; Jack Beasley; Ann Bond
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) Hiram Higsby and Allan Page open the show / (0:27) Opening theme and statements / (1:40) Hiram Higsby tells a joke / (1:51) Chuck Davis and the Roundup Boys perform "Ida Red" / (3:33) Hiram Higsby and Allan Page tell a joke / (3:47) Lexie Lou performs "Going Back To Old Montana" / (5:18) Hiram Higsby and Allan Page tell a joke / (5:39) Jack Beasley performs "Trouble Keeps Hanging Around My Door" / (8:44) Hiram Higsby and Allan Page tell a joke / (8:58) Lexie Lou and Ray perform "By The Light Of The Yeller Moon" [unconfirmed] / (11:15) Hiram Higsby and Ann Bond tell a joke / (12:07) Ann Bond performs "When I Marry, I’ll Marry For Love" [unconfirmed] / (14:08) Chuck Davis and the Roundup Boys perform interlude theme / (14:57) Allan Page introduces the Oklahoma Roundup [incomplete]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Oklahoma Roundup; KOMA (Radio station : Oklahoma City, Okla.); CBS Inc.; Davis, Chuck; Bond, Ann; Higsby, Hiram, 1909-1975; Beasley, Jack;
